name: abap2UI5-samples
description: Learn how to code with abap2UI5.

scripts.syfixes: find . -type f -name '*.abap' -exec sed -i -e 's/ RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE cx_sy_itab_line_not_found/ ASSERT 1 = 0/g' {} +
scripts.downport: rm -rf src/00 && abaplint --fix .github/abaplint/abap_702.jsonc && npm run syfixes && cp -f .github/abaplint/abap_702.jsonc abaplint.jsonc && npm run abaplintpathfix
